snippet: Paul A. Ciancia faces a first-degree murder charge after a shooting spree at Los Angeles International Airport on Nov. 1.
abstract: Paul A Ciancia faces first-degree murder charge after shooting spree at Los Angeles International Airport that left Transportation Security Administration officer Gerardo I Hernandez dead.
lead_paragraph: Paul A. Ciancia faces a first-degree murder charge after a shooting spree at Los Angeles International Airport on Nov. 1.

headline.main: Suspect in T.S.A. Agent’s Killing Is Indicted on 11 Charges
headline.print_headline: Suspect in T.S.A. Agent’s Killing Is Indicted on 11 Charges
